fields.name: referral_ref
fields.title: Referral reference
fields.description: R&M human-readable unique reference

fields.name: referral_id
fields.title: Referral ID
fields.description: R&M system unique ID for the referral

fields.name: crs_contract_reference
fields.title: CRS contract reference
fields.description: The Procurement ID of the main contract for delivering this intervention

fields.name: crs_contract_type
fields.title: CRS contract type
fields.description: Type of contract

fields.name: crs_provider_id
fields.title: CRS provider ID
fields.description: The provider ID of the primary company for delivery this intervention

fields.name: referring_officer_id
fields.title: Referring officer ID
fields.description: Referring officer ID

fields.name: relevant_sentence_id
fields.title: Relevant sentence ID
fields.description: The specific probation order this intervention is to be associated with (Delius event ID)

fields.name: service_user_crn
fields.title: Service user CRN
fields.description: CRN of the offender

fields.name: date_referral_received
fields.title: Date referral received
fields.description: Date referral is received by service provider

fields.name: date_first_action_plan_submitted
fields.title: Date first action plan submitted
fields.description: Date of initial action plan being submitted by SP

fields.name: date_of_first_action_plan_approval
fields.title: Date of first action plan approval
fields.description: Date of initial action plan being approved by PP

fields.name: outcomes_to_be_achieved_count
fields.title: Count of outcomes to be achieved
fields.description: Number of outcomes to be achieved

fields.name: outcomes_progress
fields.title: Outcomes progress
fields.description: Number of outcomes achieved or partially achieved, based on a score of 0 for not achieved, 0.5 for partially achieved, 1 for achieved.

fields.name: count_of_sessions_expected
fields.title: Expected number of sessions
fields.description: Number of sessions that the SP expects to use (based on latest version of action plan)

fields.name: count_of_sessions_attended
fields.title: Number of sessions attended
fields.description: Number of sessions with SU which have been attended (including late attendance)

fields.name: date_intervention_ended
fields.title: Date intervention ended
fields.description: Date that the EOSR is submitted OR when PP submits the premature end request

fields.name: date_end_of_service_report_submitted
fields.title: Date end of service report submitted
fields.description: Date EOSR is submitted by SP

fields.name: intervention_end_reason_code
fields.title: Code for reason for end of intervention
fields.description: Three-letter reason code for ending

fields.name: intervention_end_reason_description
fields.title: Description of reason for end of intervention
fields.description: Description of the end reason

fields.name: intervention_concluded_at
fields.title: Intervention concluded at
fields.description: Date the intervention ended or was cancelled
